revised_title: Scattering of Multipole Near-Field Sound by a Gas Bubble: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This study investigates the scattering of multipole near-field sound by a gas bubble in a liquid. The authors develop a theory for the scattering by a single spherical gas bubble near a compressible spherical monopole and dipole source. The theory is in good agreement with experiments using bubbles near a spherical monopole source and in fair agreement with experiments on bubbles near nonspherical monopole and dipole sources.
